description:
For those times you don’t want to stuff everything in a backpack. From long weekends with multiple outfits, to longer trips with efficient packing, the Boundary Hardcase Roller will keep your gear exactly where you want it, until you need it. The hard shell design helps protect your packables in cramped overhead lockers. Equipped with 4 swiveling wheels, this case turns on a dime, a nice feature when dodging weary travellers on the way to a distant gate. Regardless of your packing style, the versatile 35L has room for the roller, the folder, or the shover. And this compact design meets most airline’s carry-on requirements, so you won’t have to wait at the luggage carousels.

  • Polycarbonate hard shell construction is rugged, durable, and helps keep your belongings safe
  • 4 swivel wheels give you mobility options and handle much better than standard 2-wheeled cases
  • Removeable inner divider snaps in and out, and lets you compartmentalize your packing, or take it out when packing larger items
  • Removable divider has a lined laptop sleeve (fits up to 15in. laptops) and zippered compartments that are great for cables, chargers, etc
  • Light blue contrast lining makes it easy to spot that one thing you need
  • Lining has a DWR finish, so it stays clean longer, and makes any spills easier to clean up
  • Ribbed outside helps keep your case right side on conveyor belts and luggage racks
  • Push-button telescoping pull handle
  • Grab handles on side and top for moving onto buses or conveyor belts
  • Nests inside the Boundary 100L Roller case (sold separately) for easy storage
name: MEC Boundary Hardcase Roller - Carry On
